methods.name: datastore
title: Google
Cloud#datastore
methods.description:
Creates a new object for connecting to the Datastore service. Each call creates a new connection.

For more information on connecting to Google Cloud see the Authentication Guide.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud  = Google::Cloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore

task = datastore.entity "Task" do |t|
  t["type"] = "Personal"
  t["done"] = false
  t["priority"] = 4
  t["description"] = "Learn Cloud Datastore"
end

datastore.save task

examples.caption: You shouldnâ€™t need to override the default scope, but you can:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud  = Google::Cloud.new
platform_scope = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform"
datastore = gcloud.datastore scope: platform_scope

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/datastore

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A hash of values to override the default
behavior of the API client. See Google::Gax::CallSettings. Optional.

methods.name: datastore
title: Google
Cloud.datastore
methods.description:
Creates a new object for connecting to the Datastore service. Each call creates a new connection.

For more information on connecting to Google Cloud see the Authentication Guide.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

datastore = Google::Cloud.datastore "my-todo-project",
                                    "/path/to/keyfile.json"

task = datastore.entity "Task", "sampleTask" do |t|
  t["type"] = "Personal"
  t["done"] = false
  t["priority"] = 4
  t["description"] = "Learn Cloud Datastore"
end

datastore.save task

params.name: project_id
params.description:
Identifier for a Datastore project. If not
present, the default project for the credentials is used.

params.name: credentials
params.description: The path to the keyfile as a String, the contents of the keyfile as a Hash, or a Google::Auth::Credentials object. (See Datastore::Credentials)

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/datastore

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A hash of values to override the default
behavior of the API client. See Google::Gax::CallSettings. Optional.
